title: Yoga for beginners
brief_description: Beginner’s guide to Hatha Yoga, this progressive system of movement, relaxation techniques and breathing awareness helps you develop strength and flexibility, reduce stress, increase energy and enhance concentration. Join Patricia Walden as she takes you through a safe and easy to follow contemporary approach to this classical discipline, appropriate for beginner’s and advanced students alike. You can also tailor the program to suit your individual needs, using the step by step instructions in yoga basics for the standing poses, seated poses, inverted poses and gentle guidance into breathing awareness and relaxation as well as 3 short form individual practice sessions.
